Name: Sky Cities Of Niops
Details: A debunked hoax that appeared around the 30th century, the Sky Cities Of Niops claimed that the Star League had built a prototype anti-gravitional device that was being operational and used on the system to power massive floating megacities on the skies of Niops VI. The report included fabricated images of the cities and how Niopians kept it hidden from foreign eyes because of its potential to used to tear planets apart using 'gravitational' waves.
